time_on_asset_totals.name: course_id
time_on_asset_totals.description: course ID in the standard format as org/number/semester

time_on_asset_totals.name: module_id
time_on_asset_totals.description: ID for the asset (including video, problem, text, vertical, sequential - see course axis)

time_on_asset_totals.name: n_unique_users
time_on_asset_totals.description: number of unique users who accessed the asset

time_on_asset_totals.name: n_unique_certified
time_on_asset_totals.description: number of unique users who accessed the asset and also earned a certificate

time_on_asset_totals.name: mean_tmid5
time_on_asset_totals.description: mean time spent on asset [sec], for the given module_id, with a 5-minute timeout

time_on_asset_totals.name: cert_mean_tmid5
time_on_asset_totals.description: mean time spent on asset by certified users [sec], for the given module_id, with a 5-minute timeout

time_on_asset_totals.name: mean_tmid30
time_on_asset_totals.description: mean time spent on asset [sec], for the given module_id, with a 30-minute timeout

time_on_asset_totals.name: cert_mean_tmid30
time_on_asset_totals.description: mean time spent on asset by certified users [sec], for the given module_id, with a 30-minute timeout

time_on_asset_totals.name: median_tmid5
time_on_asset_totals.description: median time spent on asset [sec], for the given module_id, with a 5-minute timeout

time_on_asset_totals.name: cert_median_tmid5
time_on_asset_totals.description: median time spent on asset by certified users [sec], for the given module_id, with a 5-minute timeout

time_on_asset_totals.name: median_tmid30
time_on_asset_totals.description: median time spent on asset [sec], for the given module_id, with a 30-minute timeout

time_on_asset_totals.name: cert_median_tmid30
time_on_asset_totals.description: median time spent on asset by certified users [sec], for the given module_id, with a 30-minute timeout

time_on_asset_totals.name: total_tmid5
time_on_asset_totals.description: total time spent on given module_id, in seconds, with a 5-minute timeout

time_on_asset_totals.name: cert_total_tmid5
time_on_asset_totals.description: total time spent on given module_id, in seconds, with a 5-minute timeout, by certified users

time_on_asset_totals.name: total_tmid30
time_on_asset_totals.description: total time spent on given module_id, in seconds, with a 30-minute timeout

time_on_asset_totals.name: cert_total_tmid30
time_on_asset_totals.description: total time spent on given module_id, in seconds, with a 30-minute timeout, by certified users

description: Table generated with SQL query file time_on_asset_totals.sql using the simeon CLI tool. It tracks the analytics about how much time is spend on course items/assets by learners, broken down by user by module.
